contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Redondela | settlement_type = [[Municipalities of Spain|Municipality]] | official_name = <!-- if different from name --> | native_name = <!-- if different from name --> | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | image_shield = Escudo de Redondela.svg | nickname = | motto = | image_map = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = Spain | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Spain | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Spain | subdivision_type1 = [[Autonomous communities of Spain|Autonomous community]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Provinces of Spain|Province]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Pontevedra (province)|Pontevedra]] | subdivision_type3 = [[Comarcas of Spain|Comarca]] | subdivision_name3 = [[Vigo (comarca)|Vigo]] | seat_type = <!-- [[Capital (political)|Capital]] --> | seat = | latd = 42|latm = 17|latNS = N | longd= 8|longm = 37|longEW= W | coordinates_type = region:ES_type:city | coordinates_display = inline | coordinates_footnotes = | elevation_m = 17 | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 51.9 | established_title = <!-- Founded --> | established_date = | population_footnotes = <!-- for references: use <ref> tags --> | population_total = 30001 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_demonym = Redondelanos | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = [[List of postal codes in Spain|Postal code]] | postal_code = 36800 | area_code_type = [[Telephone numbers in Spain|Dialing code]] | area_code = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Xavier Bas | website = {{official|http://www.redondela.es}} | footnotes = }} '''Redondela''' is a small town in the [[province of Pontevedra]], [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]], northwestern [[Spain]]. The most famous icon of the village is its sky chaired by two major railway viaducts built in the nineteenth century. Due to these infrastructures Redondela is known under the nickname "Village of the viaducts." ==Parroquias== * [[Cabeiro]] * [[Cedeira]] * [[Cesantes]] * [[Chapela]] * [[Negros, Redondela|Negros]] * [[Quintela]] * [[Reboreda]] * Redondela * [[Saxamonde]] * [[Trasmañó]] * [[Ventosela]] * [[Vilar de Infesta]] * [[O Viso]] == See also == * [[Ignacio Ramonet]] * [[Battle of Vigo Bay]] * [[Mendinho]] * [[Ernestina Otero]] ==External links== *[http://www.pueblos-espana.org/mapas/Pontevedra/REDONDELA.png Map of Redondela area, Ria de Vigo] (small [[Portable Network Graphics|PNG]] image) *[http://www.concelloredondela.org Paxina Web do Concello de Redondela, Council's Web Site] *[http://www.ocarballodascenpolas.com Group Folkloric O Carballo das Cen Pólas (Reboreda)] <br> {{Pontevedra (province)}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Pontevedra]] [[Category:Vigo]] {{galicia-geo-stub}}
